it.unimi.di.law.warc.filters

Class StatusCategory

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unimi.di.law.warc.filters.AbstractFilter<HttpResponse>
      • it.unimi.di.law.warc.filters.StatusCategory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.base.Predicate<HttpResponse>, Filter<HttpResponse>, FlyweightPrototype<Filter<HttpResponse>>

    public class StatusCategory
extends AbstractFilter<HttpResponse>
    A filter accepting only fetched response whose status category (status/100) has a certain value.
